p: A total of 45 milligrams of each commercial herbal toothpaste (Jack N’ Jill Flavour Free Natural Toothpaste, Melbourne, Australia; Splat Organic (Splat, Russia), Splat Biocalcium (Splat, Russia) were mixed homogeneously with 45 µL of each diluted essential oil. After the addition of 100 µL of distilled water, the toothpaste–oil mixtures were homogenized in a vortex mixer (Combi-Spin, BioSan, Riga, Latvia) for 3 min. The sonicator (Gen-probe, San Diego, CA, USA) was applied for 5 min in the finalizer to complete the dissolution. A fluoride—containing toothpaste (Colgate Total, Colgate-Palmolive Co., New York, NY, USA) was used as positive control group, whereas distilled water was used as a negative control group.
